name: Out Of Money
description:
Procedurally generated roguelike adventure in the sky. Explore various sky islands, seek artifacts and sell them.

You are a raccoon who searches the islands looking for chests in which things are hidden. These things you must sell, because along the way you lose money and you must not run out when you run out, so it is the end of the game. 

Game contain 3 difficults:

Chill - explore sky islands in this joyful andventure

Money - collect and loot as much as possible 

Hard - complete with other players in this challenging mode (contain scoreboard)

Controls:

- teleport to shop - shop which buying for bad prices - normal shop

Our team (Silly Hat):
